entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023
